Marokopa fugitive father Tom Phillips: Dad Neville Phillips on how to end hunt for son, Jayda, Maverick and Ember https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/marokopa-fugitive-father-tom-phillips-dad-neville-phillips-on-how-to-end-hunt-for-son-jayda-maverick-and-余烬/5FXCV3TFFBH3JIYMMGKXXZ7UWI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/marokopa-fugitive-father-tom-phillips-dad-neville-phillips-on-how-to-end-hunt-for-son-jayda-maverick-and-余烬/5FXCV3TFFBH3JIYMMGKXXZ7UWI/ The whole thing was a 'rort from the beginning', Neville Phillips says. Fri, 08 Nov 2024 20:24:24 +0000 The Phillips children, from left, Ember, Jayda and Maverick, have been missing with their fugitive dad Tom Phillips, inset, since December 2021. The family are thought to be on the run in bush in the Marokopa area, with all four spotted by teenage pig hunters last month.
